alert.note: Alert for Springfield Vicinity, Baca County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 19 at 2:53PM MDT until March 22 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Baca County. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon through late Monday night. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute with impacts which may linger into early Tuesday morning. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This will be a heavy wet snow which when combined with strong winds may cause damage to trees and potential power outages. Visibility may drop to near zero at times due to heavy snow and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
